title: 12600 IP for Tahm Kench, 6300 IP refund Rito plz.
body:
So I was at 29808 IP then I bought Tahm Kench for 6300 IP, got a confirmation after purchase. Checked my champion pool, he still appeared in my champion pool as greyed out and my IP was still at 29808 so I bought him a second time. Now this second time, the purchase went through again however  my account IP balance now sits at 17208. 

TL; DR - Bought Tahm Kench for 6300 IP twice. Can I get a 6300 IP refund please. LOL

replies.body:
Hiya! 

As Bunta had mentioned, logging out and logging will resolve the issue if it's visual. If this doesn't solve the issue, please submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can investigate the issue.
have you tried logging out and logging back in? i know bugs like this usually get resolved by doing that. but im sure if that doesnt work then contact support!
